sub_title: Senior Business Process Specialist for Safety and Compliance - Development & Engineering - PI QPB - LPP Business Process Management
summary: Experienced Sr. Business Process Specialiat with a demonstrated history of 10+ years working in the research industry. Skilled in Compliance Management System, Safety & Compliance, Project Leading, Knowledge Management, EUV Technology, Problem Solving, Numerical Simulation, Airworthiness, Aerospace and Fluids Dynamics. High communication and Organizational Leadership skills. Strong operations professional with a Master of Science in Aerospace Engineer at Politecnico di Torino (Italy) and a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Combustion Technology at Eindhoven University of Technology (The Netherlands).

profile_positions.description:
Current Project:
Compliance Management System 

Past Project:
Dangerous Goods (Epic Process Owner for Black Box Design)
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Process Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Solving Power: how to make sure that EUV local teams become as much as possible independent and escalate issues as less as possible? How to ensure that GSC department becomes more efficient? This is the key to guarantee cost reductions, reduce mean time to repair, enhance self reliance and machine availability with lower down time

Knowledge Management: what does a department need to become more powerful in terms of knowledge? Improve training availability, secure different possibilities when travel restrictions apply (ex. COVID19), facilitate cross trainings with other sectors (EUV Factory) and drive skill management to make GSC EUV a top department and able to support from new product introduction to most advanced ones
profile_positions.title: Project Leader for Solving Power in CS and Knowledge Manager for GSC EUV

profile_positions.description:
First Line Support (FLS) engineer for Plasma Qualification competence in the Extreme Ultra Violet (EUV) Factory. Troubleshooting and Supporting during Machine Production and Install both in the ASML factory and at customer site.

FLS mission is to  Deliver World Class technical support for the NXE Production and installation process and Prevent technical disturbances from repeating. 

Technical expertise is: Plasma Qualification, Droplet Generation, Droplet Steering System, Droplet Metrology, Final Focus Metrology, EUV Time and Energy Control and Vessel/Plasma Alignment
profile_positions.title: Competence Engineer for Plasma Qualification in FLS - EUV factory

profile_positions.description:
Providing support for OpenFOAM and Combustion Modeling.
Joint research project with KAUST university.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Scientist

profile_positions.description: Assignment in Manufacturing Support at ASML EUV Factory
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer at Manufacturing Support

profile_positions.location: Eindhoven Area, Netherlands / Siemens AG Mulheim, Germany
profile_positions.description:
Doctorate program developed within a European Project H2-IGCC http://www.h2-igcc.eu . The overall objective of the H2-IGCC project was to provide and demonstrate technical solutions which
will allow the use of state-of-the-art highly efficient, reliable gas turbines (GTs) in the next generation of Integrated Gasification Combined Cycle (IGCC) plants. My role in this project was, together with Siemens AG, the development of a modeling software for the gas turbine combustion by using the reduced Flamelet Generated Manifold method from the Combustion Group of the TU/e.
profile_positions.title: Doctorate research in Combustion Technology - European Project for H2 Gas Turbine Combustion H2-IGCC

profile_positions.description:
Working for Maintenance Control Center (MCC) at Eurofly S.p.a. (Meridiana Maintenance Group).

Job tasks:

1) Long and short maintenance planning for the entire aircraft fleet (Airbus 320 - 330)
2) Troubleshooting for PART145 maintenance teams   
3) Connection between PART145 and  Continuous Airworthiness Management Organization (CAMO).
4) Quality and Safety Certificates acquired during working period.
5) Working with the Aircraft planning program AMOS
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Control Center - Eurofly spa

volunteer_experiences.description: Member and project engineer for H2-IGCC European co-founded project, in collaboration with TU/e Eindhoven. Combustion Modeling of H2 Gas turbine using OpenFOAM.
